snippet.title: Youtubers Life - Make your own videos!
snippet.description:
Watch this video and discover how to edit and publish your own videos in the most expected videogame this spring: Youtubers Life.

With Youtubers Life you can become a star on Internet! Record your own videos and see how successful you are among fans. Increase your popularity and turn yourself into a mass phenomenon… just as real videobloggers are!

This is the process that takes you to publish a video:

1. Create your character
2. Buy a game
3. Choose the type of video
4. Set up your computer
5. Play the game and record yourself
6. Edit your video

https://www.facebook.com/youtuberslif...
https://twitter.com/youtubers_uplay
http://www.youtuberslife.com/
http://www.uplayonline.com/
